Sentence.sentence: The most recent one took place last week in Washington, D.C.Students join a team through their schools, which provide a volunteer coach and pay a nominal fee to send students to regional and state competitions.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Morgan notified the Haslam administration of his decision to opt out in a letter sent last week.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In an email sent Monday to college presidents in the Tennessee Board of Regents system, outgoing Chancellor John Morgan said an internal analysis showed that each campus' spending on facilities management fell well below the industry standards identified by the state.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It has sent half a dozen passengers into space.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In Paying for the Party, Hamilton describes what she calls the party pathway, which eases many students through college, helped along by various clubs that send students into the party scene and a host of easier majors.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But this vote of confidence in Oprah sends a troubling message at precisely the time when American universities need to do more to advance the cause of reason.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In 1961, when President Kennedy declared that America would send a man to the moon by the decade's end, those words, too, had a dreamlike quality.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: With far less controversy, colleges could send messages about canceled classes, delayed buses, campus crises or just the cafeteria menu.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: More than paradise lost, a perishing rain forest could trigger a domino effect - sending winds and rains kilometers off course and loading the skies with even greater levels of greenhouse gases - that will be felt far beyond the Amazon basin.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A father who is rarely at home because he's always working sends the message that men are supposed to earn money.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A mother who is always complaining about being overweight or old sends the message that women are supposed to be thin and young
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And once you're home, recovering, Ava could let you talk to your doctor, so there's no need to send someone to your house.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Workers were not allowed to use the phone or send e-mail, but simply had the chance to clear their heads and to hear themselves think
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We will be busy receiving and sending messages.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The average American teenager sends or receives 75 text messages a day, though one girl managed to handle an average of 10000 every 24 hours for a month.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But a bigger problem may be that poor high schools often send their students to colleges for which they are "undermatched": they could get into more elite, richer schools, but instead go to community colleges and low-rated state schools that lack the resources to help them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It won't be a problem, but I need to send them over to our main cleaning facility.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Mary might as well send her dog to her relative
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It's difficult to estimate the number of youngsters involved in home schooling where children are not sent to school and receive their formal education from one or both parents.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Why did the woman send the message to the man?
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It's the message you sent me about the delivery delay of the control desks.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Send Professor Smith a letter.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He will send someone right away.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The German authorities are sending investigators to discover the cause of the plane crash late yesterday on the island of Tenerife.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Jimmy's father sent him back to Indiana after that to live with his aunt.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: In Paying for the Party, Hamilton describes what she calls the "party pathway", which eases many students through college, helped along by various clubs that send students into the party scene and a host of easier majors.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Once the interviewers have been briefed, I send the client a schedule and then they get back to me with deadlines.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Otherwise, we can send a gift card by mail if you prefer.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Some plants store reserves of water to see them through a drought; others send roots deep down to subsurface water supplies.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: They would send messages by field telephone to the code talker in the next group.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"送出，发送，传送"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: send, deliver, dispatch, forward, ship, transmit
means: send ： 普通最常用词，含义广。指把人或物由一地送往另一地，而不涉及事物的内容或 送的方式。
deliver ： 指把信件、包裹等物寄发出去或交到某地，或直接交与某人，着重发送这一行为。
dispatch ： 指为特殊目的而发送或派遣，强调紧急或快速。
forward ： 指经过其他人或手段把东西转送给某人。
ship ： 把通过水运、陆运或空运等方式运送东西。现常指商业上的运货，或将物品托运。
transmit ： 指将文件、消息等的内容或类似的东西发至某地或传达给他人。

Sentence.sentence: An inspiring story sent to the magazine should be real and original.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 阅读理解 阅读A 题设

Sentence.sentence: Back in 1983, two scientists, Jack Schultz and Ian Baldwin, reported that young maple trees getting bitten by insects send out a particular smell that neighboring plants can get.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Body language can give away a lot about your mood, so standing with your arms folded can send out a signal that you are being defensive.

Sentence.sentence: In this instance, the best solution is to send a quick, light-hearted apology to explain your awkwardness.

Sentence.sentence: Instead of walking a few blocks to pick up a child or the dry cleaning, they send the self-driving minibus.

Sentence.sentence: Look, I can send you the information about the center.

Sentence.sentence: Passengers can go quicker by sending still.

Sentence.sentence: Realisation will probably set in seconds after you've clicked "send".

Sentence.sentence: Secret codes keep messages private。banks, companies, and government agencies use secret codes in doing business, especially when information is sent by computer.

Sentence.sentence: So if we send out a robot with the single instruction of fetching coffee, it will have a strong desire to secure success by disabling its own off switch or even killing anyone who might interfere with its task.

means.word_mean: 使作出（某种反应）；使表现出（某种行为）
使进入(某状态)；迫使(in， into)
用无线电波发送; 发出信息

sentences.en: Just before I left Singapore, I sent them a telegram.
sentences.cn: 在离开新加坡前我给他们发了一封电报。

data.mean: send sth↔out 发出（光、信号、声音等）
send sb↔in 派某人去（应付困难局面）
send sb forth 派往；派遣
send sth↔on 转寄，转投（信件）
send out for sth 请（某店）送来外卖食物

sentence.cn: 银行、公司和政府机构在做生意时使用密码，特别是通过电脑发送信息时。
sentence.en: Secret codes keep messages private: banks,  companies,  and government agencies use secret codes in doing business,  especially when information is sent by computer.

lj.lj_ly: he sent word that he was busy.

lj.lj_ly: you can send away for the recipe.

jx.jx_en_mean: expel a student from a university

lj.lj_ly: you're going to get sent down for possessing drugs.
lj.lj_ls: 你将会因拥有毒品而被判处监禁。

lj.lj_ly: Bainbridge sent down 25 overs and finished with 5 for 44.
lj.lj_ls: 贝恩布里奇投球25轮，跑动5次，积44分。

jx.jx_en_mean: submit material to be considered for a competition or possible publication

lj.lj_ly: don't forget to send in your entries for our summer competition.

jx.jx_en_mean: another way of sayingsend away for above
instruct someone to go; arrange for someone's departure

lj.lj_ly: she sent him off to a lecturing engagement.
please take a moment or two to send off a cheque to a good cause.

jx.jx_en_mean: transmit mail or luggage to a further destination or in advance of one's own arrival

lj.lj_ly: I've got your catalogue—would you like me to send it on?.
lj.lj_ls: 我已收到你的目录——是否要我将它转寄出去？。

jx.jx_en_mean: produce or give out something; emit something

lj.lj_ly: radar signals were sent out in powerful pulses.
lj.lj_ls: 雷达信号以强脉冲发出。

jx.jx_en_mean: dispatch items to a number of people; distribute something widely

lj.lj_ly: the company sent out written information about the stock.
lj.lj_ls: 公司以书面形式发布了股票信息。

entry.def: When you send someone something, you arrange for it to be taken and delivered to them, for example by post.

example.ex: Myra Cunningham sent me a note thanking me for dinner...
example.tran: 迈拉·坎宁安给我寄了张便笺感谢我招待的晚餐。

example.ex: I sent a copy to the minister for transport...
example.tran: 我给交通部长发送了一份副本。

entry.def: If you send someone somewhere, you tell them to go there.

example.ex: Inspector Banbury came up to see her, but she sent him away...
example.tran: 班伯里巡官过来看她，却被她打发走了。

example.ex: He had been sent here to keep an eye on Benedict.
example.tran: 他被派到这儿监视贝内迪克特。

entry.def: If you send someone to an institution such as a school or a prison, you arrange for them to stay there for a period of time.
entry.tran: 把…送进(学校或监狱);安排…去

example.ex: It's his parents' choice to send him to a boarding school, rather than a convenient day school...
example.tran: 把他送到寄宿学校而非一家就近的走读学校是他父母的决定。

example.ex: You're saying they are sending too many people to prison?
example.tran: 你是说他们把太多人关进了监狱？

entry.def: To send a signal means to cause it to go to a place by means of radio waves or electricity.
entry.tran: (通过无线电波或电流)发射，发送,传送(信号)

example.ex: The transmitters will send a signal automatically to a local base station...
example.tran: 发射台会自动将信号发射到地方基站。

example.ex: ...in 1989, after a 12-year journey to Neptune, the space probe Voyager sent back pictures of Triton, its moon.
example.tran: 太空探测器“旅行者”号在历经 12 年的飞行后于 1989 年飞临海王星，发回了其卫星海卫一的照片。

entry.def: If something sends things or people in a particular direction, it causes them to move in that direction.

example.ex: The explosion sent shrapnel flying through the sides of cars on the crowded highway...
example.tran: 爆炸后飞溅出的炸弹碎片洞穿了拥堵在公路上的车辆车身。

example.ex: He let David go with a thrust of his wrist that sent the lad reeling...
example.tran: 他手腕猛一用力推开戴维，让这小伙子打了个踉跄。

entry.def: To send someone or something into a particular state means to cause them to go into or be in that state.

example.ex: My attempt to fix it sent Lawrence into fits of laughter.
example.tran: 我试着修理它，却让劳伦斯乐得前仰后合。

example.ex: ...before civil war and famine sent the country plunging into anarchy...
example.tran: 在内战和饥荒让这个国家陷入一片混乱之前

sentences.sentence: "The explosion sent the car flying in the air"
"He directed all his energies into his dissertation"

means.word_mean: 2. to cause or order to be taken, directed, or transmitted to another place;

sentences.sentence: "He had sent the dispatches downtown to the proper people and had slept"

means.word_mean: 3. cause to be directed or transmitted to another place;

sentences.sentence: "I'll mail you the paper when it's written"
"The spy sent the classified information off to Russia"

means.word_mean: 7. cause to be admitted; of persons to an institution;

sentences.sentence: "After the second episode, she had to be committed"

means.word_mean: 8. broadcast over the airwaves, as in radio or television;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sendan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch zenden and German senden

sentences.cn: 她带信儿说她来不了。

sentences.cn: 她托人捎话说她要回家了。
sentences.en: She sent to say that she was coming home.

sentences.cn: 埃德去不了，所以他们就派我去了。
sentences.en: Ed couldn't make it so they sent me instead.

sentences.cn: 她早早打发孩子们上床睡觉。
sentences.en: She sent the kids to bed early.

sentences.cn: 把某人关进监狱；安排某人上寄宿学校
sentences.en: to send sb to prison/boarding school

sentences.cn: 我叫汤姆去买牛奶了。
sentences.en: I've sent Tom to buy some milk.

sentences.cn: 迈拉·坎宁安给我寄了张便笺感谢我招待的晚餐。
sentences.en: Myra Cunningham sent me a note thanking me for dinner...

sentences.cn: 我给交通部长发送了一份副本。
sentences.en: I sent a copy to the minister for transport...

sentences.cn: 班伯里巡官过来看她，却被她打发走了。
sentences.en: Inspector Banbury came up to see her, but she sent him away...

sentences.cn: 他被派到这儿监视贝内迪克特。
sentences.en: He had been sent here to keep an eye on Benedict.

sentences.cn: 把他送到寄宿学校而非一家就近的走读学校是他父母的决定。
sentences.en: It's his parents' choice to send him to a boarding school, rather than a convenient day school...

sentences.cn: 你是说他们把太多人关进了监狱？
sentences.en: You're saying they are sending too many people to prison?

sentences.cn: 发射台会自动将信号发射到地方基站。
sentences.en: The transmitters will send a signal automatically to a local base station...

sentences.cn: 太空探测器“旅行者”号在历经 12 年的飞行后于 1989 年飞临海王星，发回了其卫星海卫一的照片。
sentences.en: ...in 1989, after a 12-year journey to Neptune, the space probe Voyager sent back pictures of Triton, its moon.

sentences.cn: 爆炸后飞溅出的炸弹碎片洞穿了拥堵在公路上的车辆车身。
sentences.en: The explosion sent shrapnel flying through the sides of cars on the crowded highway...

sentences.cn: 他手腕猛一用力推开戴维，让这小伙子打了个踉跄。
sentences.en: He let David go with a thrust of his wrist that sent the lad reeling...

sentences.cn: 我试着修理它，却让劳伦斯乐得前仰后合。
sentences.en: My attempt to fix it sent Lawrence into fits of laughter.

sentences.cn: 在内战和饥荒让这个国家陷入一片混乱之前
sentences.en: ...before civil war and famine sent the country plunging into anarchy...

sentences.cn: 突尼斯军方已经向该地派遣支援和直升机。
sentences.en: The Tunisian military ?has sent reinforcements and ?helicopters to the area.

sentences.cn: 派遣智者去出差. 不须反复作交待.
sentences.en: Send a wise man on errand. and say nothing to him.

sentences.cn: 我们新派遣一组护理人员开赴受灾最重的地区.
sentences.en: We're sending a fresh draft of nurses to the worst hit area.

sentences.cn: 他们派遣一位牧师,几个家庭,和个人前往.
sentences.en: They sent one of their pastors and several families and individuals to this city.

sentences.cn: 他谈到派遣更多合同飞行员的事.
sentences.en: He talked of sending in more contract fliers.

sentences.cn: 瞧, 上主替你派遣了一个人来,跟你证明那是可以的.
sentences.en: See, God has sent you a man to show you that it is possible.

sentences.cn: 今有我为我自己作证,也有派遣我的父,为我作证.
sentences.en: I testify on my and so does the Father who sent me.

sentences.cn: 去年中央政府开始派遣生育医疗专家来到地震地区.
sentences.en: The central government began sending fertility specialists to the earthquake region last year.

sentences.cn: 苏珊把她正在看的影像派遣给了他, 对权利的筋疲力尽的一个刻度盘.
sentences.en: Susan sent him the image she was looking at, a dial out to right.

sentences.cn: 为了利用这次机会我派遣了增援部队.
sentences.en: So I sent reinforcements to take advantage of this opportunity.

sentences.cn: 我听说是政府派遣破冰船来解决问题.
sentences.en: Ann : I that the government sends some icebreakers to settle the problem.

sentences.cn: 我不能下决心以我的名义派遣谁.
sentences.en: I can not make up my mind whom to send on my behalf.

sentences.cn: 时机成熟时,上帝派遣其子.
sentences.en: In the fullness of time God sent forth his son.

sentences.cn: 农业部长已经从古巴的14个省中派遣出了11个小队协助重建.
sentences.en: The Agriculture Ministry has sent in brigades from 11 of Cuba's 14 provinces to help rebuild.

sentences.cn: 国王派遣一队士兵,作为他的卫兵,威风凛凛地送他前往.
sentences.en: The king sent him in state , a troop of soldiers as his bodyguard.

sentences.cn: 萨默维尔海军上将急于向北驶去, 曾派遣谢斐尔德号去逼近并尾随敌人.
sentences.en: Admiralty Somerville, hastening northward, sent on the Sheffield to close and shadow the enemy.

sentences.cn: 一些超级强权大国总是派遣许多间谍到世界各个国家.
sentences.en: The superpowers are always sending the Trojan horses to many countries in the world.

sentences.cn: 美国在第一次世界大战中派遣一大分遣部队到法国.
sentences.en: The United States sent a large contingent of troops to France in World War I.

sentences.cn: 第二条领事官员应当是具有派遣国国籍的人.
sentences.en: Consular officers shall be of the nationality of the sending State.

sentences.cn: 中国何时能派遣一个能获胜的代表团参加奥林匹克竞赛?
sentences.en: When will China be able to send a winning team to the Olympic contests?

sentences.cn: 教宗将派遣一个使节团到英国.
sentences.en: The pope would send a legatine commission to England.

sentences.cn: 当神要拯救世人时, 他必须主动派遣他的儿子.
sentences.en: When God to save the world, he to take the initiative to send his Son.

sentences.cn: 政府同意派遣一小支象征性的部队到那一地区.
sentences.en: The government agreed to send a small token force to the area.

sentences.cn: 他被派遣去杀卖国贼.
sentences.en: He was sent for the dispatch of the traitors.

sentences.cn: 中国已派遣她的代表出席会议.
sentences.en: China has sent her delegates to the conference.

sentences.cn: 当地政府已经派遣工人在公路上撒盐和清理积雪.
sentences.en: Local authorities have sent workers to spread salt on the roads and clear the snow.

sentences.cn: 继而受党组织派遣,回到家乡,开辟 抗日 根据地.
sentences.en: Then sent by the organization to return home and open up the anti - Japanese base areas.

sentences.cn: 派遣人员的基本工资详见附件.
sentences.en: Sending personnel detailed in the annex to the basic wage.

sentences.cn: 政府派遣了一个代表团去调查情况.
sentences.en: The government sent a commission to investigate the situation.

sentences.cn: 1998年,南非与博茨瓦纳也派遣了军队到莱索托以维持秩序.
sentences.en: In 1998 South Africa and Botswana sent troops to restore order.

sentences.cn: 向宇宙飞船发出了无线电信号。
sentences.en: A radio signal was sent to the spacecraft.

sentences.cn: 他张开嘴，发出一连串嗓音。
sentences.en: He opened his mouth and sent forth a stream of noise.

sentences.cn: 请柬分发出去了没有？
sentences.en: Have the invitations been sent out yet?

sentences.cn: 如果机器人不确定某只动物是否适合放进微波炉，则有机会停下来，发出嘟嘟声，向人类寻求指示。
sentences.en: If the robot is unsure whether an animal is suitable for the microwave, it has the opportunity to stop, send out beeps ( 嘟嘟声), and ask for directions from a human.

sentences.cn: 本申请获接纳后,会发出确认通知书.
sentences.en: Confirmation Note will be sent on acceptance of this application.

sentences.cn: 他们发出了危险信号.
sentences.en: They sent out a danger signal.

sentences.cn: 你昨天发出来的附件中有一个物料有问题.
sentences.en: One of the inclosures that sent by you have some about material!

sentences.cn: 我们发出这些包裹之前请一一核对打钩.
sentences.en: Please check off the parcels before we send them out.

sentences.cn: 首先, 用户计算机相路由器发出请求.
sentences.en: First, the computer sends about it's data request to a router.

sentences.cn: 按一下收到邮件的按钮, 你应该下载测试邮件你刚才发出.
sentences.en: Click the Get Mail button, and you should download the test message you just sent.

sentences.cn: 候选人发出了三个大的邮件.
sentences.en: The candidate sent out three large mailings.

sentences.cn: 如果你希望写一个新的刊物, 那么发出一封询问函吧.
sentences.en: If you hope to write for a new publication, send a query letter.

sentences.cn: 我们发出传真后会将您的原文送到您房间去的.
sentences.en: We'll send your original copy to your room after we have faxed them.

sentences.cn: 国际技术活动发出积极的信号.
sentences.en: International technology event sends out positive signals.

sentences.cn: 他给她发出一份电报,说他立即返回昆斯敦.
sentences.en: He sent her off a telegram announcing his immediate return to Queenstown.

sentences.cn: 除非在极端的情况下, COMAP是不会通过E-mail发出任何确认 、 提醒或是通知.
sentences.en: Except in extreme circumstances, COMAP will not send any confirmation, reminders, or announcements by email.

sentences.cn: 我给自己发电, 发出兴奋波,引起收缩.
sentences.en: I generate my own electricity, and send out impulses to trigger contraction.

sentences.cn: 脑袋, 也是一样, 发出脑电波, 在脑电图中被记录下来.
sentences.en: The brain, too, sends out brain waves of electricity, which can be recorded in electroencephalogram.

sentences.cn: 光和热随着浓烟一起发出, 不久就只剩下黑色的木炭了.
sentences.en: Light and heat are sent off , together with heavy smoke, and soon only black charcoal is left.

sentences.cn: 电报已发出并已预付复电费用.
sentences.en: The telegram was sent reply prepaid.

sentences.cn: 机器发出噪声.
sentences.en: The machine sent forth loud noises.

sentences.cn: 让他快把信写好,我们好今天发出去.
sentences.en: Ask him to hurry up with those letters so that we can send them off today.

sentences.cn: 我现在接收不到电台发出的电信号.
sentences.en: I can't receive any telecommunications signals sent from broadcasting stations.

sentences.cn: 玫瑰散发出浓郁的香味.
sentences.en: The rose sends out strong fragrance.

sentences.cn: 在转入联机工作时发出未发送的消息?
sentences.en: Send unsent messages when going online?

sentences.cn: 如阁下不欲收到由本公司发出的电邮, 请回邮通知阁下的电邮地址并于主旨上加入[拒收].
sentences.en: Unsubscribe, please send me an email with UNSUBSCRIBE entered on subject and quote your email address.

sentences.cn: 从数字卫星信号中, 接收器知道卫星什么时候发出信号.
sentences.en: From the digital satellite signal, the receiver knows when the satellites sent out the signal.

sentences.cn: 太阳发出光和热.
sentences.en: The sun sends forth light and heat.

sentences.cn: 我们已向你们发出请贴,欢迎你们代表团及夫人光临.
sentences.en: We've sent you invitation All the members of your delegation and their wives are welcome.

sentences.cn: 牧羊人从远处吹哨子,向狗发出指令.
sentences.en: The shepherd whistles and sends the dog instructions from a distance.

sentences.cn: 您能派人把它修理一下 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can you send someone to repair it?

sentences.cn: 煤气或水管漏了的时候, 我们就派人去找一位管子工.
sentences.en: When the pipe leaked, we sent for a plumber.

sentences.cn: 他派人把我叫去, 我带着忐忑不安的心情来到校长办公室.
sentences.en: I was sent for and I went, feeling rather worried, to the headmaster's room.

sentences.cn: [新译]于是,约押派人去把战事的一切情形都报告大卫.
sentences.en: NIV Joab sent David a full account of the battle.

sentences.cn: 政府派人来视察我们学校.
sentences.en: The government sent sb. to inspect our school.

sentences.cn: 玛丽病得很重, 请派人去叫医生来.
sentences.en: Mary is quite ill. Please send for the doctor.

sentences.cn: 我会请他们马上派人修理汽车的.
sentences.en: I'll ask them to send someone out straightaway to fix the car.

sentences.cn: 杰米记下了泰瑞所在的位置,承诺将派人去救她.
sentences.en: Jamey takes down Teri's location and promises to send someone to retrieve her.

sentences.cn: 您们能尽快派人来看一下吗?
sentences.en: Could you send someone out to look at it as soon as possible.

sentences.cn: 公司派人去装电话.
sentences.en: The company sent a man to hook up the telephone.

sentences.cn: 我恐怕我们没有额外钥匙, 所以我派人到你房间来.
sentences.en: B : I'm afraid we have no extra key. So I'll send somebody to your room.

sentences.en: They sent him word that they wanted their rights as Englishmen.

sentences.cn: 假如他提起, 我就会派人去办.
sentences.en: If he had, I could have sent someone over to take care of it.

sentences.cn: 我马上派人到你的房间去.
sentences.en: I will send someone up to your room right away.

sentences.cn: 他身体欠安, 不能呆下去了, 于是我们便派人把他送回家去.
sentences.en: He was too sick to stay. Accordingly, we sent him home.

sentences.cn: 请派人到我房间取要洗的衣物, 好吗?
sentences.en: Could you send someone up for myaundry, please?

sentences.cn: 他们肚子饿的时候, 便派人出去买些面包.
sentences.en: When they were hungry, they sent out for some bread.

sentences.cn: 她告诉我,她第二天早晨就派人去拿.
sentences.en: She told me that she was to send for it the next morning.

sentences.cn: 我们留在旅店客房内,派人出去买些吃的.
sentences.en: We stayed in our hotel room and sent out for food.

sentences.cn: 他们派人叫他去建房子.
sentences.en: They sent for him to build the house.

sentences.cn: 他派人叫来了一名士兵.

sentences.cn: 因此专门派人员拜访中国重汽.
sentences.en: Therefore, to send specialized personnel visit China Duty Truck.

sentences.en: They sent someone to assess the value of the house.

sentences.en: I will leave the basket; you can send it round anytime.

sentences.en: I can't attend the meeting in person, but I am sending someone to speak for me.

sentences.en: I'll send for my family jewels, which are kept in a London bank.

sentences.cn: 你最好派人去请个医生来.
sentences.en: You had batter send for a doctor.

sentences.cn: 我们将派人来取.
sentences.en: We'll send someone along [ round, over ] to fetch it.

sentences.cn: 我正要去问主管早上派人来找我有什么事.
sentences.en: I was going to ask the chief why he sent for me this morning.

sentences.cn: 后来普加乔夫派人把彼得找去,向他公开了自己的身份.
